quote: When Wikileaks came out ... never heard of Wikileaks, never heard of it.
quotePlain: When Wikileaks came out … never heard of Wikileaks, never heard of it.
name: Donald Trump
where: interview with AP White House Correspondent Julie Pace

checks.short: He criticized it as early as 2010.
checks.shortPlain: He criticized it as early as 2010.

checks.quote: However, back in 2010, he told Fox News anchor Brian Kilmeade that [WikiLeaks was “disgraceful”](http://www.cnn.com/2017/01/04/politics/kfile-trump-wikileaks/) and suggested that “there should be a death penalty or something” for what WikiLeaks has done.
checks.quotePlain: However, back in 2010, he told Fox News anchor Brian Kilmeade that WikiLeaks was “disgraceful” and suggested that “there should be a death penalty or something” for what WikiLeaks has done.

claims.title: Trump hadn't heard of Wikileaks before 2016 campaign
claims.negative: Trump had heard of Wikileaks before 2016 campaign
claims.negativePlain: Trump had heard of Wikileaks before 2016 campaign
claims.truth: He criticized it as early as 2010.
claims.truthPlain: He criticized it as early as 2010.
